Title: Penguicon Events
Book Description: Steve Gutterman, Randy Bradakis, Matt Arnold, Amanda Long-Adams, Jer Lance, Gini Judd, James Hice
All Day Event: 'You’ve done the convention- you’ve met the staff- and you’ve even socialized with the ConCom. But what about those *other* Penguicon people? Those shadowy figures that create the multi-year rules- have their fingers on the money- and cause a ConChair to mysteriously appear every year in a puff of penguin-scented smoke? Ever wonder what the Penguicon Board of Directors does in their secret sanctum- and where they are taking Penguicon? Come to the Board of Directors meeting and see!'
